scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Annunciation, with the Virgin Mary seated and reading a book, while the Angel Gabriel kneels before her, holding a scroll. A dove, representing the Holy Spirit, descends from above. The background features architectural elements, including arches and windows, suggesting an interior setting. In the upper right, a depiction of God the Father is visible in a celestial realm. The overall composition is framed by decorative borders characteristic of medieval manuscripts.
